brainly_data.question: Who fired first at the Boston massacre
brainly_data.subject: History

all_answers.question: Who fired first at the Boston massacre
all_answers.subject: History
all_answers.text:
Private Hugh Montgomery was the First Man to Fire. He was the first British soldier to fire.

Hope this helps
